sectionSubtitle: Proof of Humanity enables verified human identities, enhancing security, fairness, and trust across applications.

cards.title: Decentralized Voting
cards.description: Ensure fair and transparent voting processes by verifying each voter's unique identity.

cards.title: Sybil Resistance
cards.description: Protect your platform from Sybil attacks by ensuring that each account corresponds to a real human.

cards.title: Verified Airdrops
cards.description: Distribute tokens to real users, preventing bots from claiming multiple shares.

cards.title: DAO Membership
cards.description: Grant DAO membership and voting rights to verified humans, fostering genuine community governance.

cards.title: Community Moderation
cards.description: Enable human-verified moderators to maintain healthy and authentic online communities.

cards.title: Unique Event Access
cards.description: Provide exclusive access to events or content for verified human participants.

discoverMoreText: Discover even more possibilities and explore how Proof of Humanity can enhance your project!
